name: Basic Network Configuration
content:
config interface 'lan'
	option type 'bridge'
	option ifname 'eth0'
	option proto 'static'
	option ipaddr '{{ lan_ip | default("192.168.1.1") }}'
	option netmask '{{ netmask | default("255.255.255.0") }}'

config interface 'wan'
	option ifname 'eth1'
	option proto '{{ wan_proto | default("dhcp") }}'

name: WireGuard VPN Server
content:
config interface 'wg0'
	option proto 'wireguard'
	option private_key '{{ private_key }}'
	option listen_port '{{ listen_port | default(51820) }}'
	list addresses '{{ vpn_network | default("10.0.0.1/24") }}'

config wireguard_wg0
	option public_key '{{ peer_public_key }}'
	option allowed_ips '{{ peer_allowed_ips | default("10.0.0.2/32") }}'
	option persistent_keepalive '25'

name: Basic Firewall Rules
description: Standard firewall configuration with common rules
content:
config defaults
	option syn_flood '1'
	option input '{{ default_input | default("REJECT") }}'
	option output 'ACCEPT'
	option forward '{{ default_forward | default("REJECT") }}'

config zone
	option name 'lan'
	list network 'lan'
	option input 'ACCEPT'
	option output 'ACCEPT'
	option forward 'ACCEPT'

config zone
	option name 'wan'
	list network 'wan'
	option input 'REJECT'
	option output 'ACCEPT'
	option forward 'REJECT'
	option masq '1'
	option mtu_fix '1'

name: VLAN Network Segmentation
content:
config switch_vlan
	option device 'switch0'
	option vlan '{{ vlan_id }}'
	option ports '{{ ports }}'

config interface 'vlan{{ vlan_id }}'
	option type 'bridge'
	option proto 'static'
	option ipaddr '{{ network_ip }}'
	option netmask '255.255.255.0'
